Reviews.Title: Perfect Little Pink Phone
Reviews.Author: MariaEC
Reviews.Content: I didn't buy this cell phone from Amazon... I got it from T-Mobile over 2 years ago, and I've been in love with my cell phone since.  In the two years I've had it, I have no complaints. It has great reception, super-long battery life, is compact (and pink!), the menu is very easy to use & configure. There's a camera on the phone, but it's not meant to be used for any kind of serious photography... I use it more for quick snapshots of things I want to remember. I don't care for text-messaging, or going on the web with my phone... I just want my phone to be a phone that works when I want it, and that I don't need to charge every single day. I usually go about 4 days before I need to charge it... it's that amazing (granted, I'm not a big talkaholic).

ProductInfo.Features:
memory card slot stereo Bluetooth
advanced voice dialing
dual color displays.
1.3 megapixel camera
EDGE data
ProductInfo.Name: Motorola W490 Pink
